disclosures.entity: Brisbane Broncos and Queensland Energy Minister
disclosures.details: Ticket to the corporate box at the Brisbane Broncos v Dolphins NRL Game on 24 March as a guest of the Queensland Energy Minister
Tickets to the Melbourne Formula 1 Grand Prix on Sunday 2 April from Linfox Transport
Foxtel - Complimentary subscription for the electorate office
2 tickets to the Brokenwood Graveyard luncheon on 27/05/2023
Mining and Energy Union provided 2 nights accommodation in Moranbah Queensland at the Property Vine - Monterey Moranbah for 2 People during a trip to speak with workers in the area
2 tickets from the Sports Minister to attend the Matildas vs Sweden game at Suncorp Stadium on Saturday 19 August
Local artist donated artwork for my Canberra Office Vase. Title: Night Moves; Medium: Raku with slips; Made: Jan 2023; Received: 14 September 2023; Normal Selling Price: $1400.00

disclosures.entity: Daniel Skeffington, Bonnells Bay, Lake Macquarie City
disclosures.details: Local artist donated artwork for my Canberra Office Sculpture. Title: Celebration After: La Vierge folle, dit aussi La Folle danseuse. (The Mad Dancer). Rik Wouters, Amsterdam 1912, Bronze. Lyon Museum of Fine Art.; Medium: Porcelain with 'Marble' glaze. Mounted on Australian Redwood Base.; Made: 2023; Received: 14 September 2023; Normal Selling Price: $1200.00.
Kerbmaster High Performance Mountain Bike from Cessnock Bike Shop. Received 29/09/2023
1 ticket to the 2023 AFL Grand Final from Brett O'Farrell, Hunter Sports Academy. Ticket given to my cousin to attend. Recieved 28/09/2023
A 4 hour tour around the Hunter Valley and lunch with Vintage Connections tours to discuss tourism issues and opportunities on 12/10/2023
2 tickets to the Australian Hotels Association National Board Luncheon on 6/11/2023
2 tickets to the Melbourne Cup Venture Beyond by Penfolds, in The Birdcage supplied by Treasury Wine Estates on 7/11/2023
3 tickets to the Melbourne Cup on 7/11/2023 supplied by Thoroughbred Breeders Association

disclosures.entity: Mining and Energy Union Northern District
disclosures.details: Use of an office by the Mining and Energy Union Northern District while my Electorate Office was undergoing a renovation. This was for a period of 7 weeks and allowed me and my Chief of Staff to utilise a space to meet and plan and do diary work.
Ticket to watch the Brisbane Bullets versus Tasmanian Jack Jumpers basketball game on 10 January in Brisbane. The tickets supplied by Brisbane Bullets, included a carpark pass, food and beverages.

disclosures.entity: Paul Smith, Owner of the Sydney Kings
disclosures.details: 4 Tickets to the Sydney Kings Basketball game from Paul Smith, Owner of the Sydney Kings for the game on Sunday 28 January 2024.
Received a complimentary SkyNews.com.au Streaming Subscription from CEO Paul Whittaker on 6 February. Didnt take up the offer

I received the following gifts to donate to a local charity day, A Day For Wendy, which raised funds for the Mark Hughes Foundation, which raises money for Brain Cancer Research. The day was held on 5 March 2024; 2 magnums of wine from Lakes Folly Vineyard; 3 magnums of wine from Mount Pleasant Vineyard; 6 magnums of wine from Pooles Rock Vineyard; 2 magnums of wine from Treasury Wines Estate; 1 magnum from Tulloch Wines; 4 vouchers for the Brokenwood Wines, VIP Soil to cellar experience; 2 vouchers for a hot air balloon ride from Balloons Aloft; 2 tickets to the AFL Grand Final; 4 tickets to the NRL Grand Final; 4 tickets tother State of Origin men's and women's games in Sydney; 2 business class tickets from Qantas to anywhere in Australia that Qantas fly business to; 2 tickets to the Melbourne Cup tickets in the Furphy tent; 4 tickets in the Pavilion & Piper-Heidsieck corporate box at the Repco Bathurst 1000; 1 automatic pool cleaner from Hunter Valley Pool Perfection. All of these donated gifts were given to the charity day to raffle and auction to raise money. None of the gifts were taken or use for me.
Currently renting a home to live in at Bellbird as we rebuilding our home at Nulkaba

Received 3 nights accommodation from the Mining and Energy Union on 29/30/31 October 2024 at The Star in Brisbane while I attended and spoke at their National Convention. Also attended their Gala Dinner on 31 October.
Received 4 tickets to the Melbourne Cup on 5/11/2024 from the Thoroughbred Breeders Association.
A ticket from Cricket NSW to attend the T20 International between Australia and Pakistan on 16 November. Was unable to attend.
